group_1.textRight: Is this Yamatai…?

group_1.textLeft: …There doesn't seem to be any issues.

group_1.textRight: We're making good progress.

group_1.textLeft: Whatcha doing…?

group_1.textRight: [chara:101101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eek?! U-um…
Aah! By the way, the crowds are really@bustling here!
Th-that's right!@So where's Himiko?

group_1.textLeft: …It's "Lady" Himiko, Rena, remember.
Though Lady Himiko is a benevolent person,@so I'm sure she wouldn't mind that much.
She doesn't make the people work for her,@instead she works by their side…
She uses the Spirit Arts for the sake of their@happiness, because she's a noble leader.
Still, there are lots of folks who worship@Lady Himiko, so watch how you address her.

group_1.textRight: Sounds like you really admire her.

group_1.textLeft: I admire her…@Well, it's more like I really respect her.

group_1.textRight: But it's kind of weird to call a historical figure@by his or her title...

group_1.textLeft: Hiss-tori-kal Figure?

group_1.textRight: Ah, um… I mean a famous person whose story@will be passed down to the next generation.

group_1.textLeft: …In that case, isn't it normal to call her Lady?@I don't get what you're trying to say.

group_1.textRight: Agh, geez. Fine, I get it.@I'll make sure to call her "Lady" Himiko.
Really... Why couldn't you be straightforward@about it from the beginning?

group_1.textLeft: You're still a kid. It'll be forgiven.

group_1.textRight: Uuuugh…
It's okay Rena, I think you've gotten@more mature.

group_1.textLeft: …What's that supposed to mean?
Anyways, let's go greet Lady Himiko!

group_1.textRight: You're about to meet someone you admire@with all your heart. Feelin' nervous?
I was trembling all over when I went@to a handshake event for Sayano!

group_1.textLeft: Sayano? Handshake Event?

group_1.textRight: Maybe she doesn't need to know that much...
So, are you nervous?

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah…
I'm sure rumors of me have reached Yamatai…
I don't want to be told to go home@as soon as I see her…

group_1.textRight: Lady Himiko called for you to come herself,@didn't she?
And she's a very nice lady, right?@I'm sure it'll be a-okay.

group_1.textLeft: Y-you think so…?

group_1.textRight: You're being too hard on yourself.
If she hated you, you wouldn't have been@nominated as a candidate in the first place.
Act a little more confident.@You've got people in your corner.
Not everybody will be picking on you.

group_1.textLeft: Go home.

group_1.textRight: What…

group_1.textLeft: This girl…is the candidate to succeed me?
Surely you must be joking!@The child of a Cursed God?!

group_1.textRight: How could you say that?!
Toyo…
